message: How to avoid Uncaught ReferenceError: $ is not defined in jQuery by Amr Saafan
name: How to avoid Uncaught ReferenceError: $ is not defined in jQuery
caption: amrsaafan.blogspot.com
description: Sometimes while developing an existing Web Application, I wanted to use jQuery function and I get this error "Uncaught ReferenceError: $ is not defined".
